metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12596 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In OpenEXR 2.2.0, a crafted image causes a heap-based buffer over-read in the hufDecode function in IlmImf/ImfHuf.cpp during exrmaketiled execution; it may result in denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
openexr - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1').
